lesson.title: Identifiers clean: SKU, GTIN, brand, variants

questions.question: What to check in the ID audit?
options: SKU unique, GTIN correct/not duplicated, brand filled, variant name clear

questions.question: Why does variant naming clarity matter?
options: So AI doesn’t mix size/color variants

questions.question: What is a poor example for IDs?
options: Missing GTIN, duplicate SKU, confusing variant name

questions.question: What belongs in the fix list?
options: Fix duplicate SKU, add GTIN, clean variant naming

questions.question: Why be consistent with brand?
options: AI and feeds identify the manufacturer/brand clearly
